dcterms:creator: T. Bejarano
M. De Ornelas-Couto
I. B. Mihaylov
dcterms:description: A publicly available longitudinal dataset containing three-dimensional high-resolution 3D fan-beam CT scans collected pre-, mid-, and post-treatment for 28 patients who underwent radiotherapy treatment, with manually contoured anatomical structures and dose maps.
dcterms:title: Head-and-Neck Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Alam
dcterms:description: An internal dataset containing three-dimensional CT and weekly cone-beam CT scans collected during radiotherapy of 63 patients with non-small cell lung cancer, with manually contoured planning CT and weekly CBCT images.
dcterms:title: Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Dataset
